events.message: I ordered a shirt last week but the size is completely wrong, and I want to return it and get a refund.
The customer's issue is identified as a refund request due to receiving the wrong size product.
Support agent James has been assigned to handle the refund case for the wrong size shirt.
Hello! I'm James, and I'll assist you with your refund for the incorrect shirt size.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused for the return process?
Thanks for the quick response. My order number is 123456789, and yes, the shirt hasn’t been worn or washed.
We can arrange a prepaid shipping label for the return and issue a full refund once received. Does that work for you?
Yes, that sounds perfect. Please send the return label, and I’ll ship it out today.
Return label has been emailed to you. Once we get the shirt back, your refund will be processed immediately.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
I got the refund today. Thanks for the smooth and fast support!
Thank you for confirming the refund receipt. We are closing this case now. Have a great day!
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. We appreciate your feedback!
